column1: Topping the box office charts this year, Barbie takes first place with an impressive $1,445,638,421. This beloved doll's leap to the big screen captured the hearts of audiences worldwide. Coming in second is The Super Mario Bros Movie, a nostalgic journey that delighted fans and amassed $1,362,034,072. In third place, Oppenheimer, a gripping historical drama, drew in viewers and earned $975,781,237.Fourth place goes to Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3, which continued the thrilling adventures of our favorite intergalactic heroes, grossing $845,555,777. Rounding out the top five is Fast X, the latest installment in the high-octane Fast & Furious franchise, which sped to $714,582,375.
